original_text: If you dig a deep hole, you might fall into it. If you knock down a wall, a snake might bite you. If you dig a deep hole, you might fall into it. If you knock down a wall, a snake might bite you. If you dig a deep hole, you might fall into it.
korean_text: 함정을 파는 자는 거기에 빠질 것이요 담을 허는 자는 뱀에게 물리리라

sentences.original_text: If you dig a deep hole

sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그 안에 빠질 수 있다

sentences.original_text: If you knock down a wall
